resource.title: Universal Turnover Checklist (Tropical Edition)
resource.description: Icon-based printable checklist covering zone-based cleaning flows, monsoon mode protocols, and damage audits designed for high staff turnover environments.
resource.painPoint: High staff turnover and language barriers lead to inconsistent cleaning. Western checklists miss critical tropical maintenance steps (mold, pests), leading to rapid property degradation.
keyFeatures: Zone-Based Flows: Kitchen, Bathroom, Bedroom, Balcony specific tasks
"Jhadu Pocha" Protocol: Specific sequence for dry sweep followed by wet mop to prevent mud streaks
Damage & Theft Audit: Check for missing towels, adaptors, and breakages before guest checkout
Monsoon Mode: Special section for mold inspection and leak checks during rainy seasons

specifics: Monsoon prep: waterproofing terraces, clearing drains
